overview: Left at the altar, shattered bride Lauren Phillips goes on her honeymoon by herself, making the bellhop's (Tommy Pistol) day by offering him a very generous tip. When happy newlyweds Nicole Sage and Ryan Driller arrive at the same hotel, they discover their room has been double-booked. Although the two brides are here under very different circumstances, they soon discover they have a lot in common. One room, one groom, and two sumptuous brides; what could this possibly lead to?
tagline: Getting ditched can be oh so sweet.
title: Double Booked: Honeymoon
